fig.label: Fig. 1

caption.p: pH values of rainbow trout fillets during refrigerated storage C: Without coating and vacuum control; CV: Without coating and vacuumed control; ZV: Zein coating with vacuum; ZEX: Zein coating with 2.00% extract and vacuumed; ZEO: Zein coating with 1.00% essential oil (EO) and vacuumed; ZEXO: Zein coating with 1.00% EO and 1.00% extract and vacuumed.

fig.p: abc Different letters indicate significant differences among treatments ( p < 0.05).
